abstract: AT&T released details of its shared data plans, which will allow customers to pay for a pool of wireless data and share it across multiple smartphones, tablets and laptops. It will be the second American carrier to offer this type of plan, following Verizon Wireless.

headline.main: AT&T to Introduce Shared Data Plans in August
